website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Hailee received mixed reviews from the users. They complimented its lightweight and comfortable build, true-to-size measurement, fashionable design and color options, and narrow fit. On the flipside, it earned their ire for the inferior materials and uncomfortable foot chamber. In conclusion, this model was considered good enough for casual use and light walks, but may not be comfortable and durable enough for more demanding purposes.
pros: Most users found the Ryka Hailee so comfortable that it made long periods of walking and standing a pleasant experience
Many testers praised the lightweight nature of the trainer
Plenty of buyers admired its trendy style and colorways
The shoe ran true to size, according to a handful of reviewers
People with narrow feet appreciated its snug fit
A few purchasers liked that it had a breathable upper
cons: A majority of the critics complained about the footgear’s lack of support
Numerous detractors scrutinized its cheap construction and materials, such as the tread wearing out as early as a month of use and the memory foam decompressing quickly
Various naysayers were annoyed with the hard and lumpy interiors and irritating seams that brought discomfort
Several wearers expressed discontent about the D - Wide variant of this model for not being as wide as expected

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 4 pairs with defect
customer_reviews.text: Just over a month and 1 is falling apart. It was within a week and I missed my time to return. I had been waiting on another pair of shoes that went 'missing' during delivery then I kept wearing them. I have a few pairs they wear out Becuase I walk my dogs a lot in them but these are the 1st to fall apart in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Clark

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a size 7 (the shoe size I generally wear) but they were a tad bit too big, length and toe width wise, so I ended up exchanging them for a 6.5, which fits perfectly. I purchased these shoes mainly to use for (indoor) studio gym classes and they are great! Flexible yet supportive with a very comfortable memory foam foot bed. The color (mauve) is really feminine and cute and not too pink. I've already gotten a bunch of complements on them!
customer_reviews.author: SCrosby

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, and they fit great. They are not what I consider cross trainers though, as they are very lightweight. I also noticed the sole was slippery on the wooden floor at the gym, so they are strictly at home shoes for me now. I have several pair of Ryka for Women Shoes, and they are all very well made. I would recommend, but keep in mind these are very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Greshamgal

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had foot issues for the past two years and since then have only bought Ryka sneakers. They're a perfect fit for me. I'm between a 9 1/2 and a 10, so I buy the 10 and also buy foam inserts to add a little more cushion. The cushions are not necessary as they are comfortable without them, but as I mentioned I have foot issues (plantar fasciitis) and the sneakers are a game changer. I use them for exercising and lots of walking. And the price? You can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design
customer_reviews.text: Could not wear the shoes. The day I received the shoes, I tried them on. They were a good fit, but the next day I decided to put them on. I was walking my dogs and half way through the walk, my right Arch started hurting. By the time I got home, I could not walk at all. I was bedridden for 2 and 1/2 months and still couldn't wear a shoe for another 3 month. The arc support inside the shoes are too hard and couldn't be removed. The shoes are in my closet and I will never purchase another pair from your company again.
customer_reviews.author: Doris M. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight. Built for stability but NO shock absorbtion in the insoles whatsoever!! Definitely need to buy some to put inside these if you plan on wearing them for any mid or high impact exericse..or just taking a walk!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Ryka Cross Trainers. I have bad feet with bunions and my brand name walking sneakers create blisters and hurt my feet to walk for any extended period. I switched to these sneakers and have had no blisters and am able to walk at least 2 miles each morning. I highly recommend these and the price for these was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a dang cloud!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable. They have perfect arch support and my feet feel like they're being cradled in the arms of angels. Will definitely purchase another pair or 5 when I eventually wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: fightergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10, but ended up ordering a 10 wide in these. They are roomy & comfortable. They have become my favorite work shoes. Working 12 hour shifts, on my feet can be painful if you don't wear the right shoes. Ryka is my "go to" brand for work shoes now. The styles, comfort & price are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cushy
customer_reviews.text: Very cushy nice to wear, but not really to workout in. If I wear them too long they start to hurt my heels, even though they are very cushy inside. I need a wide width in this brand of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love this you and how comfortable and lightweight they are
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of shoe. The size is pretty much right on. They are very comfortable and light weight. I have three different makes of this ryko shoe and I love them all! One of them has memory soul and it's so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color but....
customer_reviews.text: Looooved the shoe but you could feel like a staple or something on the right foot to the point I had to sadly return them. Had them on for less than 10 mins. They are pretty so if yours doesn’t come w that defect you’ll like them. Torn about ordering them again to see.
customer_reviews.author: Marta M. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but too wide for me and synthetic sole... Need rubber
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe, feels very lightweight so that was nice, seemed much more wider than the normal wide size I usually wear, so if you need really wide this should fit, also my fault I didn't read that has synthetic sole I need rubber sole for grip and longevity, good that wider size wasn't more expensive than regular sizes
customer_reviews.author: specialmom

customer_reviews.title: Quality not on par
customer_reviews.text: The quality was lacking. On the inside of the shoe by the tongue was stiff material that stuck out beyond the cloth. This caused friction and a sore on my toe. It was only on the left shoe. I have purchased this shoe in the past and had previously been very happy. Not sure that I am willing to take a chance on these again due to the injury I sustained.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Women's Hailee Cross Trainer
customer_reviews.text: My NEW Ryka shoes I love the way fit so comfortable 1 regret not buying 2.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Fi R per These fit perfectly. But they are simply the most uncomfortable trainers I have ever worn. The right show in the instep has something really hard it hurts so badly that I can not wear them at all.
customer_reviews.author: joni

customer_reviews.title: cuts into the ankle
customer_reviews.text: i don’t normally write reviews but i had to for these pair of shoes. The ankle of the shoe digs inward, right into your ankles. i have really skinny ankles and the shoes dug right in, i can’t imagine how folks with thicker ankles will do. i promptly returned these shoes. the shoes also didn’t seem to provide any support for my arches, it felt really flat and not supportive
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. So lite and comfortable. This is my second pair. The last I have worn for 4 months and they still look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: historical fiction lover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for all day walking
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was true to size for a wide width shoe. Comfortable for all day walking.
customer_reviews.author: lilith

customer_reviews.title: They run large
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shoe, they feel very loose in toe area, my foot slips around. This was my first pair of Ryka purchased, not happy with fit. Gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So lightweight that I thought the box was empty! Comfortable and lots of support. I could wear these for hours and not have my feet bother me.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great Tennis shoe. Two large, and didn’t have the support I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes may be a Ryka knock off. I have happily worn Ryka’s for years but these shoes are poor quality. The padding is sparse, the Memory Foam forgets and is thin, and the sole is inflexible. The only quality that is traditional Ryka is the toe box is roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Not much support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because it said it was a cross trainer. Well there isn't enough support for aerobics and I do low impact. Like the light weight of the shoe and if it was just for every day wear it would be okay.
customer_reviews.author: JudyCH

customer_reviews.title: I usually buy Ryka for step aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Ryka is my fav step aerobics and zumba shoe. I like this shoe but the soles are very slick. That's the thing I don't like about them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely on the small side. The "memory foam" soles are weak at best, definitely don't hold up very well. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty but one shoe they not feel comfortable & hurt the bottom of my foot. So I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Half the Price With All the Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Zumba. I read that Ryka cross trainers are great for Zumba. These aren't the Influence or Tenacity that get rave reviews, but they work well at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable yet stylish
customer_reviews.text: Imlike the way the shoes fit on my feet. I walk a lot and these shoes are very comfortable. I really like the style and color
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have always had good luck with Ryka. First week felt good, but since the shoe has memory foam and it is not good for walking shoe. You need support!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Hailee Cross Trainer fits me well, I have wide, flat feet. These are the shoes I prefer to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Slightly big
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5M and these are a bit on the big size. Next time I'll go down half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon branham

customer_reviews.title: Loved these and I’m a trainer
customer_reviews.text: Looking to buy another pair when they come into stock
customer_reviews.author: R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great, Lightweight sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Needed new sneakers. Don’t usually buy shoes online but I do have a few Ryka shoes and knew they were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Denise J Getson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: They look great and feel great. They aren't snugg at the wide part of the foot. So they maybe a bit big for people with very narrow feet. For those with wider or regular width foot they are perfect with great support.
customer_reviews.author: Amart

customer_reviews.title: I like the comfort of the shoes, the fit.
customer_reviews.text: The fit, the color of the shoes, I'm using them for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn ziegenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Ryka is a nice line of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ryka is my new brand of shoes. I love how they need to be wide in just the places. However, these fell short of that. Ordered a 9 wide. This style is not very wide at the ball of foot. So they pinch a little. For the price, I'll break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Ryka
customer_reviews.text: A little to big and doesn’t have the best traction
customer_reviews.author: Drey ihm

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoes for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight just wearing them with my uniform at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: I love the light weight feel & has nice arch support
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Love rykas
customer_reviews.text: Need to wear socks..I have 7 pair of rykas..these were a bit different
customer_reviews.author: MARIANNE

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very very cheap they’re way too big that’s one problem but the cheapness of them once you put them on really does not feel good on your feet and you will not be happy with them I return them.
customer_reviews.author: Owl Mom

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is true to fit.
customer_reviews.text: I brought the shoes for working out. I love the style , comfort and fit . The shoe is very cushiony .
customer_reviews.author: Gail Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Best Price Online
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka's and this was the best price online as well as the color I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: HBM

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: There is not much support. I bought insoles and that helped some. They look very nice with my work uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Milian

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Color is really pretty. Shoe is very comfortable for my feet
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are now the only sneakers I’ll wear. I love the memo foam, it’s not too bulky. The shoe fits great, I wear them for waking and to a job where I’m on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They fit like they were made for me; they're light as a feather, yet super supportive! And they're cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Fits well and bright colors so cheerful. Going to be my favorites! Kathy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M Greene

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not comfortable and offer a minimal amount of cushion inside. Goes to show you get what you pay for! It won’t take me long to wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, good construction but it runs large. I had to return and get a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: Super light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes: comfort, good materials quality, light weitgh and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Alves Soprano

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the coloring. I always buy one size bigger than I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend if you need good arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ryka for years but this model did not have the arch support or the comfort that I know, trust, and expect.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes are super comfortable. Order for your activity. Walking, cross trainers, or running they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Arliss Meinerding

customer_reviews.title: Made for women
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ryka shoes since 1992. I order a 1/2 size larger and they are a perfect fit. They are a good quality shoe made for women.
customer_reviews.author: Murphys mom

customer_reviews.title: wide
customer_reviews.text: Wider across the toes compared to another type of Ryka shoe I purchased in the past
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T Alvinito

customer_reviews.title: ran too taight and very stiff shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was too tight in width and too small in length, and quite uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: just mysteries

customer_reviews.title: Need to be more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is good, just not as comfortable as I thought they would be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable women's sneakers I have ever worn! I purchased two additional pair since I wear sneakers all day, every day. Just ordered their winter boots. I hope they are equally as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: amriggie

customer_reviews.title: perfect for treadmills
customer_reviews.text: love Ryka fits as expected and so comfortable on treadmills.
customer_reviews.author: lillian h.

customer_reviews.title: Stand up to wear. Good support
customer_reviews.text: I use this shoe to umpire college field hockey. I order two pairs at a time and alternate them. Love the support and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: They should be True to size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 8.5 wide it fits extremely big got them don’t have the box could not return.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto bran

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy cross trainers!
customer_reviews.text: These cross trainers are very comfy straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Genifer

customer_reviews.title: Almost no cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was okay but wearing these shoes is like walking directly on cement, no discernible cushioning. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JULIA E KOFKE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes!! Very comfortable! Wear them to walk and work out!!! Love the memory foam insoles!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Laney

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for the price. They are lightweight , comfortable and great for the gym. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and true to size
customer_reviews.text: I love ryka, these seem lower quality for them but for the price they are perfect comfy running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra

customer_reviews.title: fit is beautiful! My only worry is that the Ryka Womans ...
customer_reviews.text: fit is beautiful! My only worry is that the Ryka Womans Hailee Cross Trainers may become too hot when walking in the heat of a summer day....
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Strissel

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good, but have no support for long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Jordan King

customer_reviews.title: I was not pleased with the sole of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased with the sole of the shoe. It was very poorly made...not like the previous Rykas I have had. I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable .
customer_reviews.text: This shoe does not fit well, it feels bulky and uncomfortable to walk in. I have always liked Ryka shoes but this one does not feel like the quality product that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Susan benoit

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: somewhat small, vendors don't know how to fit larger feet very well. Will NOT buy from China anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jules Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka shoes best shoes made for women. It's all I ever wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs too big
customer_reviews.text: The size is huge! My foot was slipping around in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Griffioen

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Ryka. These were a great price
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dundid

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. I do a lot walking with my job. I am glad I found them....
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my mom. She loves them. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my mom. She loves them. She now has them in two colors and wants another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and looks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for walking. The color is very pretty and they look good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M.

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Hailee Cross Trainer
product_meta.description:
* Work your core and glutes in style with the Ryka® Hailee.
 * Fabric and mesh upper with synthetic overlays.
 * Lightly cushioned collar with heel tab.
 * Lace-up closure.
 * Breathable textile linings.
 * Antimicrobial Ortholite® footbed for added comfort.
 * Durable rubber outsole.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements:  *  Weight: 7 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 8, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
